channel.title: Drew's Private Feed: Peecast Blast
channel.description:
Drew's Private Feed: The best comedy podcasts of all time team up for a "Monsters of Rock"-style, all-day super event! Comedy Bang! Bang! (featuring Scott Aukerman, Paul F. Tompkins, & Lauren Lapkus), The Andy Daly Podcast Pilot Project (with Andy Daly & Matt Gourley), Off Book (with Jess McKenna & Zach Reino), Doughboys (with Nick Wiger & Mike Mitchell), Throwing Shade (With Erin Gibson, Bryan Safi, & special guest Ronna Glickman), and The Teacher's Lounge (with Jon Mackey, Ryan Rosenberg, Dan Lippert & Drew Tarver) join forces for a show that will go down in the annals of comedy history!
This feed was generated by Drew for private use.
channel.itunes:author: Stitcher Premium
channel.itunes:summary:
The best comedy podcasts of all time team up for a "Monsters of Rock"-style, all-day super event! Comedy Bang! Bang! (featuring Scott Aukerman, Paul F. Tompkins, & Lauren Lapkus), The Andy Daly Podcast Pilot Project (with Andy Daly & Matt Gourley), Off Book (with Jess McKenna & Zach Reino), Doughboys (with Nick Wiger & Mike Mitchell), Throwing Shade (With Erin Gibson, Bryan Safi, & special guest Ronna Glickman), and The Teacher's Lounge (with Jon Mackey, Ryan Rosenberg, Dan Lippert & Drew Tarver) join forces for a show that will go down in the annals of comedy history!
This feed was generated at UnofficialRSS.com for private use.

item.title: Comedy Bang! Bang!: Piping Hot Fire Alarm (LIVE)
item.description: Live from The Theatre at the Ace Hotel in Downtown, Los Angeles, Scott Aukerman welcomes his nephew Todd (Lauren Lapkus), intern Gino Lambardo (Jon Gabrus), self-proclaimed fan favorite Rudi North (Shaun Diston), and The Contraptionaire (Paul F. Tompkins).

item.title: Bonanas For Bonanza Episode 2 Live at Peecast
item.description: Earwolf's very own Poet Laureate of the West, Dalton Wilcox is back with episode two of his podcast Bonana's for Bonanza. Dalton is joined by his favorite panel of experts, Mutt Taylor, Sally Jasper, Shunt McGuppin, Cubby Lauderbourne, and incompetent publisher of books, Russel Schein. Dalton and crew go in depth about Ben Cartwright's many dead wives, cattle theft, silver miners, and other goings-on on the Ponderosa. Finally, the show comes to a close with an amazing performance from The Journeymen. Special Guests: Matt Gourley, Betsy Sodaro, Mark McConville, Paul F. Tompkins, Jeremy Carter, Tony Thaxton, Daniel Michicoff, Shannon Locke, and Scott Passarella.

item.title: OFF BOOK: Reggie Watts Live from Peecast Blast!
item.description: Reggie Watts joins Jess, Zach, Scott, Dana and Brett for a brand new live musical from the one and only Peecast Blast, packed with dog cafes, dog scientists, Mario references and more! With songs like "They Die", "More Parts of a Dog", and "Be My Supporting Mario Crew", you'll be flying high like you're in a Tanooki suit after listening to this ep.

item.title: Doughboys: Wetzel's Pretzels with Sean Clements and Hayes Davenport (LIVE)
item.description: Live from Peecast Blast, Hollywood Handbook hosts Sean Clements and Hayes Davenport return to discuss every menu item at Wetzel's Pretzels.

item.title: Throwing Shade Live from Peecast Blast with guest Ronna Glickman!
item.description: Erin and Bryan bring a taste of their 2018 Condo Owner tour to Peecast Bast. They tackle 'ssues and hot topics like what is a summer penis? And, should you really winterize your vagina? Finally they bring out the one, the only, Ronna Glickman to dish out some life advice to the Peecast audience. Can you handle it?

item.title: Big Grande's Teacher's Lounge: Ira Pass with Sailing Instructor Commodore Jaxley (Paul F. Tompkins)
item.description: Live from Peecast Blast, the guys talk about LA and do a live read of Todd's play with sailing instructor Commodore Jaxley (Paul F. Tompkins).

item.title: Comedy Bang! Bang! - LIVE at Pee Cast Blast 2017
item.description: Live Comedy Bang! Bang! performance from Los Angeles, CA featuring Scott Aukerman, Paul F. Tompkins as Mike the Janitor, Carl Tart as Chief, Zeke Nicholson as Bone Queef, Lauren Lapkus as Waldo, and Mary Holland as Jennifer Spot.

item.title: How Did This Get Made? - Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets (w/ Doug Benson)
item.description: Doug Benson of Doug Loves Movies joins Paul, Jason and guest co-host Jessica St. Clair to discuss the 2017 science fiction film Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets. Recored live at the Theatre at Ace Hotel for Pee Cast Blast ’17, they cover everything from Rihanna as Bubble, a shapeshifting alien entertainer to the movie resetting itself every 15 minutes.

item.title: improv4humans - LIVE at Pee Cast Blast 2017
item.description: Jon Gabrus, Eugene Cordero, and Mary Holland join Matt Besser for a live episode at the Ace Hotel for Pee Cast Blast '17! They take audience suggestions that lead to scenes about sharks playing cornhole, the hunt for a better mattress, and a restaurant that specializes in big potatoes. Plus, Jesus returns to help a college student turn her grades around and a mom gets crude in terminology during the sex talk.

item.title: Hollywood Handbook - Carl Tart, Our Pee Cast Blast Friend
item.description: Carl Tart joins the boys live at the Ace Hotel for Pee Cast Blast and to help them sell ads to the audience.

item.title: Who Charted - LIVE at Pee Cast Blast 2017 with Horatio Sanz
item.description: Horatio Sanz joins Howard and Kulap for a live Who Charted, recorded at the Theatre at Ace Hotel for Pee Cast Blast ’17. Howard spouts facts about the Ace Hotel’s history and Horatio offers song visualizations while they count down Billboard’s Hot 100. Plus, Horatio shares his Hallmark fantasy film during the Movie Chart.

item.title: Playing Games with Jimmy Pardo - Special Guest: April Richardson
item.description: Comedian Jimmy Pardo hosts a pop culture game show-interview podcast; three contestants vie for prizes. Live from Theatre at Ace Hotel. Special guest: April Richardson.
